description: A representation of an ssl certificate
title: Certificate

___matches.description: A list of Url match pattern strings, to identify Urls this certificate can be used for.

___name.description: A name for the certificate for user reference

___key.description: An object containing path to file containing private key, on the file system

___src.description: The path to file containing key for certificate, on the file system

___cert.description: An object containing path to file certificate, on the file system

___src.description: The path to file containing key for certificate, on the file system
